orderManagement.title: Effortless Order Management

notifications.title: Automated Notifications

payments.title: Simple Payment Tracking

freeTrial.question: Is there a free trial?
freeTrial.answer: Yes, our Basic Plan includes a 1-month free trial. You can test all the essential features before committing. No credit card is required to start the trial.

changePlan.question: Can I change my plan later?
changePlan.answer: Absolutely. You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time directly from your account dashboard. The changes will be prorated.

smsRequirements.question: What is required for sending SMS?
smsRequirements.answer: To send SMS notifications, you will need to connect your own third-party SMS gateway account (like Twilio, Vonage, etc.). We provide easy integration.

features.title: Features That Power Your Business
features.subtitle: Discover the tools designed to make managing your pressing and laundry service simpler, faster, and more professional.

orderManagement.title: Comprehensive Order Management
orderManagement.description: Log every detail of an order with ease. Add multiple clothing items, specify services like 'Dry Clean' or 'Iron Only', set quantities, and include special instructions for delicate garments. Every order gets a unique receipt number for perfect tracking.

customerDatabase.title: Integrated Customer Database
customerDatabase.description: Build a relationship with your clients. Save customer contact information for quick order creation and view their complete history at any time. Our system helps you provide that personal touch.

paymentTracking.title: Flexible Payment & Discount Tracking
paymentTracking.description: Handle finances with clarity. Record advance payments, apply percentage or fixed-amount discounts, and instantly see the balance due for any order. The system automatically tracks paid and unpaid statuses.

notifications.title: Automated Customer Notifications
notifications.description: Stop spending time on the phone. PressFlow automatically sends an email or SMS to your customer the moment their order is marked 'Ready for Pickup', enhancing their experience and freeing up your time.

dateTracking.title: Date Tracking & Overdue Alerts
dateTracking.description: Never lose track of a deadline. Set expected pickup dates and times for every order. The admin dashboard prominently flags any orders that are overdue, so you can take action immediately.

adminSettings.title: Customizable Admin Settings
adminSettings.description: Make the application your own. From the Admin Area, you can customize company information for receipts, and modify the email templates sent to your customers for a fully branded experience.

receipts.title: Professional Printable Receipts
receipts.description: Generate clean, itemized receipts for your customers with a single click. Each receipt includes a full breakdown of items, services, prices, discounts, and payment status, just like a modern supermarket.

cta.title: See It In Action
cta.subtitle: Ready to take control of your workflow? Start your free trial and experience the difference today.
